text: 💡 Did you know that electricity and gas prices have skyrocketed in Europe since Russia's invasion of Ukraine? 🤯 But who has the priciest energy in Europe? 🤔 Let's find out! 📊🇷🇺 Russia, of course! 😏 Their electricity prices have increased by 57% and gas prices by 34% since February 2022. 💸🇩🇪 Germany follows closely with a 46% increase in electricity prices and a 28% hike in gas prices. 😬🇫🇷 France, you ask? 🤔 They've got the third-highest electricity prices, up by 31%, but their gas prices have only risen by 14%. 💦And the winners are... 🎉 North Macedonia and Bosnia and Herzegovina! 🇲🇰🇧🇦 They've got the cheapest gas prices in Europe, with €10.4 and €5.9 per 100 kWh, respectively. 💰But wait, there's more! 😱 EU natural gas imports from Russia made up almost 50% of the total before the war. 🤯So, who's ready to switch to renewable energy sources? 🌞💚 Let's work together towards a sustainable future! 🌈💕
